title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5018.5 - Interest rate for calculation of service retirement benefit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5018.5 - Interest rate for calculation of service retirement benefit

State Regulations

The lump sum payment of a de minimus service retirement
benefit pursuant to section
537
of the

Education Law shall be calculated using the percentage interest rate on 10-year

United States treasury obligations as of January 1st of the calendar year of
the effective date of retirement truncated to two decimal
places. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5018.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
